website_summaries.verdict: Well built and smooth operating, if a bit heavy, this fly reel is an absolute bargain.
pros: Drag adjustment holds taut even under load
Easy to swap from right to left hand retrieve
cons: Too heavy to balance well on shorter fly rods
Drag adjustment is somewhat touchy and can lock up when fishing in salt water
Not much depth for backing line

customer_reviews.title: Beginner, on a budget, looking for something to ride around in the vehicle just in case, don't hesitate this is it.
customer_reviews.text: 15ish bucks unreel bought a black and a gold came right hand retrieve flipped the bearing no problem, swapped the spools work great, now I have two 3/4 weight black and gold reels. Both reels are fairly smooth drag works good. Put one on my piscifun 3/4 weight legend hooked a carp 20 - 25" despite my concern they handled the fish like a champ. Amazing this kind of quality could be so cheep. This reel out performs a $125 dollar reel I have in every way even looks. when you can haul in a fish that has you this out sized and nothing falters or even feels maxed it is well worth looking at.
customer_reviews.author: Donald R.

customer_reviews.title: found a very nice rod at an estate sale this reel was a ...
customer_reviews.text: Needed a low cost replacement reel, found a very nice rod at an estate sale this reel was a perfect fit. I was impressed with the quality, this finish has held up well. I saw in other reviews some complaints on the fit and finish. This reel works, it catches fish and it's affordable. I'm a fisherman not a collector. I highly recommend this reel.
customer_reviews.author: GP

customer_reviews.title: Balances out beautifully. Reel strips and retrieves line remarkably well far ...
customer_reviews.text: WOW! I had bought this reel as a spare for 6 wt line. At the low price, and reading other reviews I had thought it would be an ok reel to keep as a spare around in the truck for an emergency breakage replacement. Well did I ever get a surprise, this reel is on par with any reel that has been attached to my 8 1/2' Fenwick FF80 rod. Balances out beautifully. Reel strips and retrieves line remarkably well far above comparably priced units. This reel now is my main reel I use with this rod.
customer_reviews.author: Woogyeman

customer_reviews.title: Good drag..
customer_reviews.text: I just received two a few hours ago and set them up on some new rods I built. First off, with these cheaper reels, my first concern is the drag. Thus far, I will say this: the drag appears to be good. I was actually impressed. For the price, this is a no brainer. I bought two 4wt reels and they hold 50 yards of 20lb backing, with 100 foot of weight forward taper perfectly. It is unlikely a 4wt reel will end up in the backing, unless you are fishing water you shouldn't, but... if perchance you hook into a toad, the drag should hold just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Ed-Jack

customer_reviews.title: Works, but save your money.
customer_reviews.text: First off, this item is NOT CNC machined like the item title says. It is made from cast aluminum. The casting is of a pretty low quality, and the paint is pretty ugly too. There is some slop between the spool and spindle, and the spool isn’t balanced so when retrieving line the handle wobbles. The drag is quite poor, without much usable range. Also, it only barely fits a standard, WF5F line and 50 yards of #20 backing. But what can you expect for a $16 dollar reel. If all you plan to use it for is hold line, and not fight fish into your backing than it should get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Max L.

customer_reviews.title: Loading Line on Reel
customer_reviews.text: This reel looks and feels good. My comment at this time (as I have not fished with it yet) is that when loading WF 4F line, it only needed 20 feet of 20 lb backing, just enough to cover the arbor a couple of times and so that I would have some backing to tie the fly line onto. The arbor of the reel is large in diameter, a nice design item for a 3/4 weight reel. Converting it from right to left hand was super easy, watch the video. The clip in the printed instructions is not the correct clip. The clip is retained within the arbor.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Oversized to use as nymph reel - could almost be heavier
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these already for my 5wt flyrod and liked the reel enough to order another - has a simply sprag bearing type reversing system (flip the bearing to reverse the action) with good sensitivity between settings on the reel. I thought the cage would prevent the euro leader from getting behind the reel and it seems mostly to do so but the gap is just enough that in theory you might need to pop the spool off - the only issue is that the spool retention lever is somewhat dainty and I wonder if it will stay engaged over time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is not a bad reel for the price. It will do the job intended. I recommend this reel if you are getting into fly fishing for the first time. I purchased it for my wife as I do not know if she will like the sport so I wanted to stay as cheap as possible. I gave it a 4 star because it is a basic reel and not as nice as some of the higher end entry level reels. So if you are not sure about the sport of fly fishing this is definitely the way to go to get started....cheap ;)
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: But overall it is a great buy and will buy another I'm sure
customer_reviews.text: Required me to flip the hub and also bend the hanger a bit. But overall it is a great buy and will buy another I'm sure. I don't see the point in buying a $100 fly reel anymore! This works well.
customer_reviews.author: Tindall Knives

customer_reviews.title: Impressed for the price point!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little reel and paired perfectly with the Eagle Claw Featherweight 3/4 wt rod I bought for my son. Nice smooth drag and seems well machined. As with most cheap reels, it has no click and pawl on the retrieve, just on the outgoing drag. So, sometimes it will retrieve line while you're casting by centrifugal force, causing the reel to bring stripped line back in. Speaking of the retrieve, mine came as a right hand retrieve--it's relatively easy to switch, though.
customer_reviews.author: BobGuy

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I purchased as a backup and wasn't expecting much for $16.99, I was pleasantly surprised. Reel appears to be well put together and drag is very smooth. I spooled w/50yds of 25lb backing and 90ft of WF4F Orvis Clearwater fly line, paired to a 6'6" Eagle Claw Featherlight 3wt rod(looks pretty cool). Maybe this weekend I'll give her a go at a local pond. This reel came in right hand retrieve out of the box, switching to left hand retrieve is a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Shrekoutdoors

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for medium to heavy use
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the headache of rigging this reel up and end your day on the water. No grease or oil inside the reel( bearings dry) save a little more money and get a simple lightweight tough reel. Not recommended for medium to heavy use. I fish several times a week with fly and regular spin gear and it didn’t last one day . No matter what always disassemble your new reel and lube it up where it’s needed!!
customer_reviews.author: L C

customer_reviews.title: For The Price A Decent Reel
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box this looks like a good deal for my backup rod. And it came with everything you need to set it up. It came right hand retrieve but swapping was as simple as pie. Drag is smooth, retrieve not as much (thus the 4 rating) but acceptable at this price range. It will catch fish.
customer_reviews.author: Buying FrenzyTop Contributor: Fishing

customer_reviews.title: Good reel just not what is advertised
customer_reviews.text: Its a decent reel you're just not getting an aluminum cnc'd reel its made from a casting. One tip to make it last is put a bit of lock tite on the threads or the reel will loosen up and it wont work properly after a few uses. Tried to customize the spool so i stripped the paint that coats the reel and i tried to re-ano at work (anodizing specialist). Can't dye casting, have to hit it with a rattle can now :(
customer_reviews.author: Mariano Ibanez

customer_reviews.title: Reel is just as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in 2 days of shipping and in a nice felt bag, inside a solid box. No problem changing over to L hand after pulling out retainer clip and reversing the main bearing. easy peasy ! Added some grease and it now spins silky smooth. Tight fit and nice finish. Nice gold color as advertised and looks to be a very decent product. time will tell, but for a 5/6 reel I'm very pleased with the purchase and low price.
customer_reviews.author: Monomoy

customer_reviews.title: I ended up replacing with a better reel. Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered this item, I thought why not take a chance on a low cost reel. This was going to be used on my second fly rod. The fact is, even though it appears to be solid and well-made, the reel just doesn't work very well. For example, if you pull line off the reel quickly, the spool will spin too fast and create backlash. This also happens when you try to reel in quickly. It just isn't worth even the small amount that it cost. I ended up replacing with a better reel. Don't bother!
customer_reviews.author: Karl A Mayer

customer_reviews.title: The drag works fine for as seldom as I need it
customer_reviews.text: First off I'm a novice, I have been fly fishing off and on for 15 years. I fly fish sunnies in the spring and that's about it. For $16. you can't beat it. The drag works fine for as seldom as I need it. It holds line and its smooth. no plastic!
customer_reviews.author: Benny

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok for now. Very Smooth
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t like how the drag was set for leftys from the factory, took about 30 mins to switch it to be right handed. Had to take the whole reel apart to switch it. Had very small springs and detents, be careful to disassemble in a clear bag because springs will jump out. The main screw is lefty to tighty, righty to loosy. Very smooth reel.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: BEST reel value I've ever found
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 - the olive and the gold. both in the 4/5 size. I flat out love them. The click isn't too loud...the large arbor is great...the drag works fine...and I just get to fish...not worry if I put a scratch on a reel that costs hundreds of bucks when I lay it down to land a fish in the net. (My son got my Orvis stuff...I'm happy with this reel and don't miss the other)
customer_reviews.author: solocanoe

customer_reviews.title: Nice little reel.
customer_reviews.text: Really can’t complain about anything for the price of this reel. It doesn’t feel expensive, how ever what do you expect for a reel under $20? I did flip the bearing inside to change the direction of the drag. But for fly fishing you really don’t anything super fancy for it simply just holds the Line. 5/5 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jon-Michael Harper

customer_reviews.title: Reel nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a 5/6 in gun green. Immediately impressed out of the box, great looking design and I like the large arbor. Good balance between not being insanely heavy and not flimsy plastic. Has operated perfectly with no issues so far. Descent anti-reverse/drag system. Doesn’t have a clicker but I go by feel rather than the sound anyway and it feels good. Came set up for a right hand retrieve, but it’s easy to change the LH/RH retrieve and comes with instructions to do that. Looks and feels like a more expensive reel than it is, and you can’t beat the quality for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice Reel
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly, this is a very good reel. Being so inexpensive, I expected it to be sloppy, but it's well made. It functions as well as any of my more costly Ross Reels. It was easy to reverse to opposite hand function. The disk drag works nicely and is quiet. (Having grown up in the era of click drags, this is a bit disarming. I miss the sound of my drag screaming.) I've caught some trophy fish and this reel handled them with a smile. I would like to get another spool, but they don't offer them. At this price it's more economic to just get a second reel anyhow.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Nice reel for a good price
customer_reviews.text: My first fly reel: Croch 5/6 wt in silver. I like it. Smooth retrieve. I give it a 4 star because it has no instructions. Only a parts diagram. I removed the spool and gave it a good oiling and it is silent when the spool is spun. I think I will keep it. Thanks again Croch. Nice reel. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: hombre243Top Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: GOOD REEL FOR THE PRICE
customer_reviews.text: Good inexpensive reel. However, despite what the company says, mine came loaded for RIGHT hand retrieve. You have to unwind the line, swap the handle and then re-spool. Not a huge deal but I was specifically looking for a LEFT hand retrieve when ordering and the info posted by the company is inaccurate.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin D

customer_reviews.title: Ok reel, garbage line
customer_reviews.text: The reel is ok at best, a little heavy. The line that comes on the reel is totally useless. It's not castable. Get the reel is you are looking for a cheap one, but invest in proper line. Also they do not provide any information on line and leader weight for the preliaded stuff. Let's put it like this, the kits that you get a Walmart (courtland) have better line.
customer_reviews.author: FancyNancy

customer_reviews.title: Low Priced Reel
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box the reel seems sturdy. No noticeable wobble and the reel feels smooth in the retrieve. Drag seems a little binary with little difference between the two extremes of the knob. Maybe it will break in over time. These are definitely cast parts, and the cheapness shows in the post-casting finishing. There were a few burrs that I had to remove in the frame near where the line exits the spool. Bought this to get a budget 8wt setup going for the saltwater flats of Florida's East Coast, so we'll see how it holds up if rinsed after each trip. Won't be too concerned if it only lasts a few trips.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a well.made, heavy duty reel. Paired it with a 3/4 Eagle Claw 6'6" fly rod. The pair is perfect for small.pond and stream fishing where there are trees nearby. Will update review once I have used it more.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew S.

customer_reviews.title: Ok reel, could do better with not too much more money.
customer_reviews.text: This is an identical looking reel to the Eagle Claw Black Eagle and the MaxCatch Eco. I can't speak to the MaxCatch reel, but the Eagle Claw reel is a better built reel with higher tolerances all around. Although they look the same, they are not. I would spend the bit extra and buy the Eagle Claw.
customer_reviews.author: Ted SmithTop Contributor: Fishing

customer_reviews.title: Functional.
customer_reviews.text: Sharp edges required filing and smoothing. Spins freely, which I prefer, unlike many more expensive models. Large arbor helps with line memory and faster retrieves. Drag is adequate and the reel functions well.
customer_reviews.author: rabbitaco

customer_reviews.title: Just OK, the backlash problems rather spoiled the reel.
customer_reviews.text: The reel is Ok in terms of fit and finish but I have had some difficulty with backlash. To resolve the issue I put a bit of Teflon tape around the axle and then seated the reel over the tape. After that the reel behaves properly. I feel like the spool sits slightly higher on the spindle than it should but that is speculation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a serious reel
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive and cheap. I guess I shouldn't complain at the price. I bought it for my 7 year old so I wouldn't mind him dragging it in the sand and dirt. It's better than the plastic ones you get at Walmart, but not much better.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners to intermediate
customer_reviews.text: Good little real for the money. Well see and the drag is good. These reels are interchangeable but the come from Amazon set up for RIGHT hand retrieve. The only reel you need until you buy a $500 rod.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Paint chipped and messed up bearing and drag system
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the box and got the reel out of the bag, I tried to open the reel to switch it to left hand reel and the bearing was stuck on the shaft. The drag system is all messed up, I'd like to swap the reel out for one that is setup properly and in good working order without paint chipped. Thank you for sending me a new reel that works. That was nice of you to contact me and help me get a good reel. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Jonathon Saari

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, simple
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, simple, lightweight reel. It appears well-built and there are no issues with spool rubbing the frame. I particularly like the wide spool. I have it mounted on a 6 1/2' 3/4 wt. rod with 4 wt. line. Drag is smooth and easily adjusted. With resonable care, this reel should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: James R. Fowler

customer_reviews.title: NOT CNC MACHINED
customer_reviews.text: This reel is a case of "you get what you pay for". Be aware this is NOT cnc machined. There are casting marks all over it. The paint on it is very thick and uneven. But it does hold line and the drag does seem to work. It's good enough for the price but it's listed as a machined reel which is a total lie.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice paint job!
customer_reviews.text: Hope it lasts...if not I'll keep it in my car to use as a self defense weapon. its heavy...lol..on a serious note, it's not bad for a beater or a second reel, have to watch the drag to prevent backlash because the spool free spins pretty good..lol
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Comes right handed but can be reversed
customer_reviews.text: Great beginner reel. I got back into fly fishing a while back and got this to go with a wakeman combo. (Good pole,bad reel that's why I bought this reel) I've had it for about 3 months and I havnt had a problem with it. Except for the reel comes tight handed. Which is a simple matter of flipping the bearing, which isn't that hard.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan james poelstra

customer_reviews.title: a good buy.
customer_reviews.text: I used the reel yesterday for the first time. The reel's mechanism is very smooth. This reel's finish is "just OK". But for the money, I think,,a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: joseph beck

customer_reviews.title: Awesome reel for the money!
customer_reviews.text: This reel is great! I can confirm that you can set it to retrieve line with either hand., All you have to do is reverse the pin on the inside of the reel. I bought the 3wt and am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: NJF

customer_reviews.title: Really good reel. Had to reverse the action as came ...
customer_reviews.text: Really good reel. Had to reverse the action as came for a right hand return but transition was easy. Smooth and well built
customer_reviews.author: Niteowl5

customer_reviews.title: Best reel no matter the price.
customer_reviews.text: I only paid $17 for a reel that is perfect for my 5 wt rod I built. Unless you steal one, you couldn't beat this deal.
customer_reviews.author: Sam S

customer_reviews.title: Quality workmanship
customer_reviews.text: Could not believe the quality of this reel. Price was unbelievably affordable. I want to buy another one a different size next. I bet, after having taken it apart and examining it closely, it will give many years of service.
customer_reviews.author: Sidney E. Holden

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive but Fuctional Reel
customer_reviews.text: This is a light weight reel to be place on an inexpensive fly rod which will be used as an introductory outfit for a new fly fisherman while fishing for pan fish. It should perform well.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: The finish on the reel is not very good. Could be a lot better. It seems to function ok
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Reel for the money...
customer_reviews.text: Love this reel. Extremely smooth. Fit and finish are good. Drag is easy to adjust. Having said that the drag is a hair sensitive, I.e. Can be moved a little too tight, a little too loose when adjusting. But this is a minor problem. I have handled trout to 20" with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Canoer1959

customer_reviews.title: Nice, small reel
customer_reviews.text: I like it, smooth, color is nice and accurate from pictures and doesn't break the bank. I use a 7ft6in rod
customer_reviews.author: AVaaj

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nothing better for the money!!!! Caught 2-3 rainbows on the Colorado river no problems at all!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Go catch some fish
customer_reviews.text: This thing catches fish. Wasn't expecting a whole lot for a 20 dollar reel but it functions well and I had no problem catching larger fish with this reel. Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Scroopy noopers

customer_reviews.title: Pretty happy
customer_reviews.text: Im not sure its billett looks like cast marks on the spool & had some scratches on the spool thats why didnt give it 5 stars haven't got to use it yet but im happy sofar other than stated looks nice drag seems to work by hand very smooth and well for the money im happy camper would like to have a 5wt also
customer_reviews.author: Jim Clay

customer_reviews.title: Work great!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my children's cricket fly rod. They look and work great. For the price I plan to order one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Tyvannah

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice little reel
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little reel. The drag actually adjusts, unlike some others I've had. And it's nice and smooth. I'm very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: No fuss great value. Works great. Have 3 with different lines ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: GREAT REAL FOR THE MONEY
customer_reviews.text: EASY TO FILL WITH LINE and very lite to cast
customer_reviews.author: we sent the jacket back today ups

customer_reviews.title: Price is awesome, and with a lil bit of reel butter ...
customer_reviews.text: Price is awesome, and with a lil bit of reel butter on the internal bearing it is smooth as glass!
customer_reviews.author: Mwaite

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money, cheap and doesnt perform well
customer_reviews.text: Not put together great 3wt line comes through the sides as if it wasn't tight enough kinda of irritating when fishing constantly having to address it and fix it. Would not buy again and will replace soon.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Impressed with the value for the money. I’m using these for ice fishing but I’m a huge fly fisherman and I’m going to recommend these reels to friends that want to try fly fishing.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy J Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great feel, smooth bearing in rotation, good drag. I would buy this again. Also baught the 3Wt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t make it to first cast.
customer_reviews.text: Took it out for its first run. And there is zero line tension. Unable to get it to work properly. Very disappointed and ruined a good fishing trip
customer_reviews.author: Fowtown

customer_reviews.title: Great reel for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Good drag. Doesn't hold a lot of line for the size of reel. It's worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: rbil415

customer_reviews.title: It's just a device to store your line.
customer_reviews.text: Good little reel for the money. Drag is not silky smooth like some folks reviewed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best for buy that stands up to the most expensive reels!!!
customer_reviews.author: Thelma Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Poor drag.
customer_reviews.text: This reel is horrible. The drag is useless. Even tightened down completely, the reel still spins freely when pulling line to cast creating a mess of line on the reel.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The quality is great
customer_reviews.text: I love how it's so smooth working and light weight. The perfect reel you could ever buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Good
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband he used it one time and did not work. Bad idea buying it
customer_reviews.author: Phooey

customer_reviews.title: Great Reel -
customer_reviews.text: This reel is great. A buddy and I took it out the day it was delivered. We got home and he ordered 1 also. Unlike many other small reels this has a nice reel handle that is usable. The drag system works great. No reel wooble. Only suggestion to manufacturer is the seats could be a bit thinner.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value for the money. Seems to be well made and has a smooth drag. Mine spent several days in the bottom of the lake until I was able to fish it out, with no apparent ill effects.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Turner Construction, Inc.

customer_reviews.title: Need help on how to set it up and use ...
customer_reviews.text: Need help on how to set it up and use it. Can't get a hold of anybody. Any one help me?
customer_reviews.author: Lewis G. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: beautiful reel, well made, well finished, and very well engineered!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too late!
customer_reviews.text: By the time I was able to use the reel it was beyond return time.. The drag doesn't work and the reel wobbles in the casing. It seems as though a part is missing so basically it is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Aacer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have used it a lot and really enjoy how light it is. The adjustable drag works well.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and functions well
customer_reviews.text: Can’t expect mush from $16 but it works well and looks pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Selena P Moretz

customer_reviews.title: Best band for your buck
customer_reviews.text: For the price you can’t beat it. Great backup reel or beginners reel. I use it on my carp set up and holds up like a champ!
customer_reviews.author: John-Paul Duff

customer_reviews.title: Nice little reel!
customer_reviews.text: I am a lefty, so followed the directions to reverse the mechanism. Worked great. Have taken it out once so far and it has worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Riani

customer_reviews.title: Price is a bargain
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, works great for trout fishing. Decent reel for the money
customer_reviews.author: Mike E.

customer_reviews.title: Good price and works OK
customer_reviews.text: best value for the money! Most fly reels are overpriced. This was the most economical, and it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Rick D.

customer_reviews.title: I was pretty disappointed with this reel
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty disappointed with this reel. Price-wise it was cheap enough for a beginner fly angler, but it looked cheap, like r would o my last a season or two. I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: this is a really good reel for the money
customer_reviews.text: this is a really good reel for the money, I now have 2 and if I need more I'll get more.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the price. Drag is not as smooth as I would like.
customer_reviews.author: Kayak007

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Fly reel, well balanced.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Fly reel, well balanced , well machined. Great price! I am buying another for redundancy.
customer_reviews.author: Jose King

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME REEL
customer_reviews.text: Awsome little reel for a insane low price. Works like a champ.
customer_reviews.author: MOm of 3 musketeers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: not bad at all for the price.. had to switch it around since i am left hand retriever
customer_reviews.author: Mr.MousaTop Contributor: Fishing

customer_reviews.title: Fell Apart
customer_reviews.text: When I got the product it came reeling in the weong direction (I reel with my left hand - as do majority of anglers). When I went to change the direction, it completely fell apart. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Glass

customer_reviews.title: No problem
customer_reviews.text: This is a lot of reel for the money! I fish about 250 days a year and have no problem with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ben C.

customer_reviews.title: Reel was much better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Reel was much better than I expected, .considering the low price. However, my order requested a 7/8 wt. reel, but what was delivered was a 5/6 wt reel. I did not return wrong reel because it's weight was such it became a balanced item for my 7/8 fly rod. A good product, but erroneous service. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: harold beane

customer_reviews.title: Drag doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Finally had a chance to test this reel out. The drag doesn't work at all, so the reel thing tangles up (like backlash on a baitcast reel) whenever you strip line out to cast. Worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Northcote

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not as good as I hoped
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking reel, but first use in salt water, after extensive cleaning and lubrication, caused the drag adjustment to lock up when I used it a second time. I knew the reel wasn't top quality, but was disappointed in how quickly it locked up. Cleaned it all up again, lubricated, and we'll try it again. But I'll be bringing a click and pawl reel as a backup.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: Great reel for the price. I’m buying a second one so I don’t have to change line.
customer_reviews.author: D.

customer_reviews.title: A reel deal!
customer_reviews.text: Very fine bargain reel! No complaints on this reel. It does it's intended purpose well with no flaws yet. I'll keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Lane

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to put on a Walmart $28 Eagle Claw Fly Rod. Just trying to see if a $50 rig is possible. Good match.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Rat

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap and instantly broke
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap broke right away! Terrible drag, please do not buy. Go to Cabela’s and spend a few extra dollars and get a good reel. Amazon saved the day and gave me a refund!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Be careful it is NOT as good as it appears
customer_reviews.text: When it arrived the line was so tangled, I had to cut off the leader/tippett and replace it. The drag knob is so tight it requires pliers to adjust it. Too much work
customer_reviews.author: Joe N.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 2 seasons until the drag started failing and it free spooled at times
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Item was received in great condition I can't wait to get out there and ...
customer_reviews.text: Item was received in great condition I can't wait to get out there and go fly fishing and try out my new reel
customer_reviews.author: theresanicholas

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I sent it back due to the spool would not stay in the reel
customer_reviews.author: Brian Krueger

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly a great value!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to create my own rattle reel setup for Ice Fishing, worked out great! Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional for the price
customer_reviews.text: Looking for workable inexpensive fly reel and this was much better than I expected
customer_reviews.author: Charles Theobald

customer_reviews.title: He said he would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our kids starter kit. My husband was impressed by the quality for the price. He said he would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Moriah C.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I wanted an inexpensive reel for my inexpensive 3/4 wt. This completely fits the bill. No regrets buying this reel.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Shipped fast and performed better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Shipped fast and performed better than expected. I'm an avid fly Fisher and this thing worked great when paired with the right line and rod.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works just fine with the heavy reds in the Kenai
customer_reviews.author: garry a

product_meta.title: Croch Fly Fishing Reel with Aluminum Alloy Body 3/4, 5/6, 7/8 Weights(Black, Gun Green, Gold, Silver)
feature_bullets: Aluminum alloy for high-impact durability and all-conditions corrosion resistance. Ultra-lightweight, practical, less line stacking, higher line retrieval rates
More solid and smooth. Stainless steel drag system with one-way clutch bearing for smooth immediate drag engagement
Super quality--Cold-forged, CNC-machined, high-grade aluminum construction
Hard anodized for surface protection and corrosion resistance; Concave ported arbor for greater strength and capacity
Mid-arbor design for easier and quicker retrieve; Easy conversion from Left-hand to Right-hand

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
